summary: Frontend adds Checkout and Order Confirmation views and wires basic navigation and cart clearing, but backend order placement (Motoko actor changes) is not present in the diff summary, and some checkout edge-case behaviors are not fully evidenced due to truncation.

evidence: File diff summary: Added/Modified files list contains only frontend files; no backend/main.mo changes shown.

evidence: frontend/src/components/CheckoutView.tsx (truncated): shows submitError state and begins handling actor-missing error ('Unable to connect to the backend. P...') but rest is truncated.

missing_requirements.requirement: The “Place order” button shows a loading state while the order is being submitted and prevents duplicate submissions.
